text: Len Kasper (born January 21, 1971 in Mt. Pleasant, Michigan) is a broadcaster who calls MLB games on the radio for the Chicago White Sox. He also called games for the Florida Marlins and the Milwaukee Brewers as well as a studio host for the Packers Radio Network. ==References== Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:1971 births Category:Living people
title: Len Kasper
